name: Hidden Scenes - The Storyteller
description:
Hidden Scenes is a game similar to a jigsaw puzzle where you swap and flip the pieces to reveal the hidden scene. When all pieces are flipped / swapped into their correct location, you win!

Our latest Hidden Scenes game features iconic images from 20 well-known stories, including scenes from Cinderella, Aladdin, 101 Dalmatians and Alice in Wonderland!

Four different modes of play:
SWAP - swap the pieces into their correct spot, easy and relaxing
FLIP - swap and flip the pieces into their correct spot, a little more challenging
ROTATE - swap and ROTATE the pieces into their correct spot! Can be very challenging!
RADIAL - swap pieces of a circular puzzle, very unique!
